lead_paragraph: Richard S. Johnson shot a three-under-par 67 and Nick Flanagan had a 63 to share the second-round lead at the PGA Tour’s U.S. Bank Championship in Milwaukee.
snippet: Richard S. Johnson shot a three-under-par 67 and Nick Flanagan had a 63 to share the second-round lead at the PGA Tour’s U.S. Bank Championship in Milwaukee.
